line_1: Stands waiting at your gaping Tombs,
line_2: Leap into Life, for Jesus comes.

line_1: And taught to warble 'mid the village tombs.
line_2: His daring mind thy humanizing glooms
Roves, when the glimmering twilight glooms,

line_1: And taught to warble 'mid the village tombs.
line_2: His daring mind thy humanizing glooms

line_1: Let pale-ey'd Spectres burst their yawning Tombs,
line_2: And dreadful Echos shake th' hideous Gloom;

line_1: And quivering spectres grinn'd amid the tombs;
line_2: Long ailes of Cypress waved their deepen'd glooms,

line_1: To Gothick churches, vaults, and tombs,
line_2: Where each sad night some virgin comes,
